Package eu.sternbauer.EtlGenerator.KnowledgeBase.Join.service

Class JoinService

java.lang.Object
eu.sternbauer.EtlGenerator.KnowledgeBase.Join.service.JoinService
@Service public class JoinService extends Object
Service implementation to access data, via repositories, for Join-related tables

  • Method Details

    • getAllJoinTables

      public List<KBJoinTableDTO> getAllJoinTables()
      Fetches a list of all JoinTables from the database and returns them in the form of DTOs. These items include a list of their mappings and columns, as DTOs.
      Returns:
      A List of JoinTable DTOs

    • getAllJoinMaps

      public List<KBJoinMapDTO> getAllJoinMaps()
      Fetches a list of all JoinMaps from the database and returns them in the form of DTOs. These items include a list of their columns, as DTOs.
      Returns:
      A List of JoinMap DTOs

    • getAllJoinColumns

      public List<KBJoinColumnDTO> getAllJoinColumns()
      Fetches a list of all JoinColumns from the database and returns them in the form of DTOs.
      Returns:
      A List of JoinColumn DTOs

    • addJoinTable

      @Transactional public KBJoinTableDTO addJoinTable(KBJoinTableDTO joinTableDTO)
      Saves a JoinTable to the KnowledgeBase. Handles updates of Map and Column foreign keys' to their respective parents.
      Parameters:
      joinTableDTO - Element to be saved
      Returns:
      The KBJoinTableDTO element from the save statement.

    • removeJoinTableById

      @Transactional public void removeJoinTableById(long joinTableId)
